titles.title: Behold the Lamb with glory crowned

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Behold the Lamb with glory crowned, To Him all pow’r is giv’n: No place too high for Him is found, No place too high in heav’n.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: Though high yet He accepts the praise His people offer here; The faintest, feeblest note they raise Will reach the Savior’s ear.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: This song be ours, we join in one To celebrate the Name Of Him that sits upon the throne, And to exalt the Lamb.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: To Him whom men despise and slight, To Him be glory giv’n; The crown is His, and His by right The highest place in heav’n.
